post.author: 허현옥
post.content:
This is what I found from your script files.

myschool_db.sql-----------------------------------------------------
51 line:error: NOTES LONG VARCHAR(500) ---> NOTES VARCHAR(500)
77 line:error:  After 77 line  
                        NOTES VARCHAR(255),
                        PRIMARY KEY (USER_ID)    <-- ADD THIS LINE

83,84,85 line: error:
        DESCRIPTION LONG VARCHAR, ---> DESCRIPTOIN         TEXT,
        STUDENT_ID NOT NULL,           ---> STUDENT_ID         BIGINT                 NOT NULL,
        CONSULTANT_ID NOT NULL,   ---> CONSULTANT_ID         VARCHAR(15)         NOT NULL,


install.bat-------------------------------------------------------------
if MySQL 4.1 or up and root account has password :

        line 4 : mysql<myschool_db.sql --->  mysql -u root -p < myschool_db.sql

after execute install.bat, you have to type int root account's password.

uninstall.bat----------------------------------------------------------
if MySQL 4.1 or up and root account has password :

        line 4 : mysql<drop_db.sql  --->  mysql -u root -p < drop_db.sql

after execute uninstall.bat, you have to type int root account's password.
post.title: confirming sql script
